maliput_malidrive
Public Member Functions | Static Public Attributes | Protected Member Functions | List of all members
Function Class Referenceabstract

Detailed Description

Describes a G¹ scalar function.

This interface will be the interface for other specializations which are use by RoadCurve to compose the path of maliput::api::Lane.

In mathematical terms, let:

\( F(p) \) be a function of a real and non-negative parameter.

And \( F(p) \) has the following requirements:

  • \( F(p) \) is G¹ in the interval \( [p_0; p_1] \).
  • There exists \( F''(p) \) in the interval \( [p_0; p_1] \).

Provided that \( F(p) \) can be piecewise defined, implementations must include proper G¹ checks in IsG1Contiguous().

#include <src/maliput_malidrive/road_curve/function.h>
